channel.title: Comments on: Palliative care, Chabad and Rabbi Dr Barry Kinzbrunner
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Mordechai Y. Scher
item.dc:creator: Mordechai Y. Scher
item.description:
Dr. Barry Krinzbrunner authored, with this son's help, the overview article for Journal of Palliative Medicine on Halacha and end of life care.
Barry M. Krinzbrunner, Jewish Medical Ethics and End-Of-Life Care, Journal of Palliative Medicine, Vol. 7 No. 4, 2004
I didn't know he was doing presentations. My impression from his writing was that he knows his stuff, and is pretty responsible about the overall topic.
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Barry Krinzbrunner authored, with this son’s help, the overview article for Journal of Palliative Medicine on Halacha and end of life care.

Barry M. Krinzbrunner, Jewish Medical Ethics and End-Of-Life Care, Journal of Palliative Medicine, Vol. 7 No. 4, 2004

I didn’t know he was doing presentations. My impression from his writing was that he knows his stuff, and is pretty responsible about the overall topic.
